name: Arkas Tower Defense - Gameplay Prototype
description:
Arkas Tower Defense

A tower defense where you play your own defense!

The prototype is there to test the gameplay, the game art will be totally reworked, this is only placeholder.

We need your feedback to know in which direction the players want the game to go!

Build your own labyrinth, activate your traps!

Alternate between strategy phase where you place your defense and action phase where you activate your traps to defend your base.

 : Place rocks to block enemies path  : Bows must be placed on rock, drag your mouse from the bow to shoot an arrow

 : Click on spikes to activate them, dealing damage to any enemies on them.

 : Freezing trap automatically slow enemies walking on it

Most traps have cool-down, wait till the white bar below the trap is full to use them again.

There is a system which prevent you from blocking the enemies path but it's a bit buggy so try to avoid placing wall blocking the enemy path.
